dialog.speaker: user
dialog.text: Hi, I'd like to order delivery to Bandra West

dialog.speaker: bot
dialog.text: Welcome to our restaurant! We are open from 11 AM to 10 PM daily.

dialog.speaker: user
dialog.text: That's not what I asked. Do you deliver to Bandra West?

dialog.speaker: bot
dialog.text: I apologize for the confusion. Let me check our delivery areas.

dialog.speaker: user
dialog.text: Can you just tell me yes or no?

dialog.speaker: bot
dialog.text: I'm sorry, I'm having trouble accessing our delivery information right now.

dialog.speaker: user
dialog.text: This is ridiculous. I'm hanging up.

dialog.speaker: user
dialog.text: Hi, I'd like to order a pizza for delivery

dialog.speaker: bot
dialog.text: Great! I'd be happy to help you order a pizza. What size would you like?

dialog.speaker: user
dialog.text: Large please

dialog.speaker: bot
dialog.text: Perfect! We have several large pizza options. Would you like our classic Margherita, Pepperoni, or Supreme?

dialog.speaker: user
dialog.text: Pepperoni sounds good

dialog.speaker: bot
dialog.text: Excellent choice! Your large pepperoni pizza will be ready in 25-30 minutes. What's your delivery address?

dialog.speaker: user
dialog.text: 123 Main Street, Apartment 4B

dialog.speaker: bot
dialog.text: Perfect! I have your order: 1 large pepperoni pizza for delivery to 123 Main Street, Apartment 4B. Your total is $18.99. Would you like to pay with card or cash?

dialog.speaker: user
dialog.text: Card please

dialog.speaker: bot
dialog.text: Great! Your order is confirmed and will be delivered in 25-30 minutes. Thank you for choosing us!

dialog.speaker: user
dialog.text: Thank you!

dialog.speaker: user
dialog.text: Hello? Is anyone there?

dialog.speaker: bot
dialog.text: Hello! Welcome to our restaurant. How can I help you today?

dialog.speaker: user
dialog.text: I want to know your menu

dialog.speaker: bot
dialog.text: I'd be happy to help you with our menu. We have pizzas, pastas, salads, and desserts. What type of food are you interested in?

dialog.speaker: user
dialog.text: What pizzas do you have?

dialog.speaker: bot
dialog.text: We have Margherita, Pepperoni, Supreme, Hawaiian, and Vegetarian pizzas. All pizzas come in small, medium, and large sizes.

dialog.speaker: user
dialog.text: What's in the Supreme?

dialog.speaker: bot
dialog.text: Our Supreme pizza includes pepperoni, sausage, mushrooms, green peppers, onions, and extra cheese.

dialog.speaker: user
dialog.text: That sounds good. How much is a large Supreme?

dialog.speaker: bot
dialog.text: A large Supreme pizza is $22.99. Would you like to order one?

dialog.speaker: user
dialog.text: Yes, please

dialog.speaker: bot
dialog.text: Great! I'll help you place your order. What's your delivery address?

dialog.speaker: user
dialog.text: 456 Oak Avenue, Suite 7

dialog.speaker: bot
dialog.text: Perfect! Your large Supreme pizza will be delivered to 456 Oak Avenue, Suite 7. Your total is $22.99. How would you like to pay?

dialog.speaker: user
dialog.text: Cash on delivery

dialog.speaker: bot
dialog.text: Excellent! Your order is confirmed. Your pizza will be delivered in 25-30 minutes. Thank you for your order!
